item.description: Join us for a kickoff event in Franklin Park featuring free walks, bike clinics, yoga and fitness classes, kids’ activities, and a live performance of the Boston Pops Brass Ensemble.  Boston’s Circle The City (CTC), an Open Streets initiative connecting people to parks, is launching this summer on three Sundays: June 24 (Franklin Park), July 15 (connecting Jamaica Pond) and August 5 (featuring the Rose Kennedy Greenway). Offering free activities for all ages that promote healthy, active urban living, CTC will draw people out of their homes and cars and onto safe, car-free streets to walk, bike, roll and play in, and to celebrate some of our greatest urban resources—our parks.
item.name: COMMON BOSTON - Circle The City
